title: Server problems
body:
I have recently wiped my computer because it was hacked and i have restarted everything. I go to play league get into a queue go through champ select and then it takes me to what is suppose to be the loading screen. My screen goes black for a few minutes and then a notification pings and says I cannot connect to the severs please reconnect and try again.
I have done this probably 50 times and nothing happens. I checked my settings and nothing has changed,I have restarted my router 5 times without any change. I have attached an Ethernet cable to my router and still the same thing. I am now being penalized because this has happened 3 times in a row now when trying to play a normal draft game but I can for some reason get into customs just not a real game. What do I do?!! I love this game but this is getting to the point where I am just going to quit and I dont want to. If anyone has any suggestons please tell me!!!!

replies.body:
This certainly sounds like your connection to the gameservers is unstable and causing you to be unable to connect. I recommend checking your local network settings against our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it can often result in resolving these types of issues.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

I have used the pathway options given about using my firewall and accepting league of legends in the video provided but nothing is working still. I have uninstalled league and re-installed it but still nothing. Currently i am running zone alarm as my firewall which is up to date and i have all league setting set to trusted which should allow me access. I am running AVG as my antivirus which is up to date aswell. I am not sure what else to do in this situation.
Do you still encounter issues connecting after **completely uninstalling** both AVG *and* Zone Alarm?

So far when i uninstalled my firewall it seems to work multiple times getting into a custom game i am just going to try a draft game now. I believe it should work and if it does thank you for the help and getting back to me on this page.
I will try uninstalling them and see. I haven't done that yet with the firewall
